reviewText: Very educational and informative travel DVD. However, it is too brief and too short. Left out many other interesting sites.

We were planning a first-time trip to Montreal, and I was surprised to find nothing available in the way of a travel shows at the video stores or the library. I was very happy with the "Montreal" DVD I ordered. It was intelligently written, and showed a number of the top tourist areas in Montreal (lots of emphasis food and eating). It was definitely an asset in planning the trip, and I was able to locate many of the places shown in the video when we visited. My only criticism is that it was too short - something like 28 minutes.
